mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO rect(lo1_lng, lo1_lat, lo2_lng, lo2_lat, lo3_lng, lo3_lat, lo4_lng, lo4_lat) VALUES
(#{rect.lo1.lng}, #{rect.lo1.lat},#{rect.lo2.lng}, #{rect.lo2.lat}, #{rect.lo3.lng}, #{rect.lo3.lat},#{rect.lo4.lng}, #{rect.lo4.lat})

INSERT INTO rect(lo1_lng, lo1_lat, lo2_lng, lo2_lat, lo3_lng, lo3_lat, lo4_lng, lo4_lat) VALUES (#{rect.lo1.lng}, #{rect.lo1.lat},#{rect.lo2.lng}, #{rect.lo2.lat}, #{rect.lo3.lng}, #{rect.lo3.lat},#{rect.lo4.lng}, #{rect.lo4.lat})
